name: aspnetcore-with-typescript-scss
description: NPM scripts for work with Typescript and SCSS in ASPNETCore Application`

scripts.dev: npm run watch:typescript & npm run watch:css & dotnet run --watch
scripts.build: npm run build:typescript & npm run build:css
scripts.build:css: node-sass source/styles/scss -o wwwroot/assets/styles --output-style compressed && npm run prefix:css
